patthana18.4:4.1: Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nanahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana18.4:4.3: nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:4.4: Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa ca nanahetussa naappaccayassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:6.1: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:6.2: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:6.3: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:6.5: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:7.1: Hetuṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:7.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:8.1: Nahetuṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:8.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana18.4:9.1: Hetuṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:9.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:10.1: Nahetuṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:11.1: Hetuṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:11.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:12.1: Nahetuṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:13.1: Hetuṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:13.2: Nahetuṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:13.3: Hetuṃ lokuttarañca nahetuṃ lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:13.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:14.1: Hetuṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:15.1: Hetuṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
